getVariableNames() - Method in class com.soa.activity.script.performer.ScriptedActivityContext
Returns the names of the variables in the context of the process.
getVariableNames() - Method in interface com.soa.process.bpel.runtime.script.ProcessContext
Deprecated.
Please use ProcessContext.getVarNames() instead. Returns the names of the variables in the context of the process. Changes to the list will not result in changes to the real variables. New or removed variables after calling this method will not be reflected in this list without making another call.
getVariableNames() - Method in class com.soa.process.bpel.runtime.script.ScriptedProcessContextImpl
Deprecated.
Please use ScriptedProcessContextImpl.getVarNames() instead. Returns the names of the variables in the context of the process. Changes to the list will not result in changes to the real variables. New or removed variables after calling this method will not be reflected in this list without making another call.
